publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5124 Michael McMahon: Holytown Primary School Supports Malawi—That the Parliament notes the outstanding efforts of the pupils of room 14 at Holytown Primary School, Lanarkshire, in raising over £700 for their food aid project for Malawi; notes that the pupils conducted an assembly, to which the local community was invited, which highlighted the levels of poverty in Malawi, and sends its best wishes to the school’s head teacher, Morag Johnston, who will be visiting Malawi in February 2007 to support educational initiatives in that country.

S2M-5124 Holytown Primary School Supports Malawi (lodged on 8 November 2006) Des McNulty*, Bruce Crawford*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Bill Butler*, Trish Godman*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Helen Eadie*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Mrs Mary Mulligan*, Alex Neil*, Eleanor Scott*, Janis Hughes*, Murray Tosh*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Paul Martin*, Scott Barrie*, Ms Maureen Watt*

S2M-5124 Michael McMahon: Holytown Primary School Supports Malawi—That the Parliament notes the outstanding efforts of the pupils of room 14 at Holytown Primary School, Lanarkshire, in raising over £700 for their food aid project for Malawi; notes that the pupils conducted an assembly, to which the local community was invited, which highlighted the levels of poverty in Malawi, and sends its best wishes to the school’s head teacher, Morag Johnston, who will be visiting Malawi in February 2007 to support educational initiatives in that country. Supported by: Des McNulty, Bruce Crawford, Mr Frank McAveety, Bill Butler, Trish Godman, Roseanna Cunningham, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Helen Eadie, Mr Jamie Stone, Mrs Mary Mulligan, Alex Neil, Eleanor Scott, Janis Hughes, Murray Tosh, Dr Elaine Murray, Paul Martin, Scott Barrie, Ms Maureen Watt, Jackie Baillie*, Ms Sandra White*
S2M-5124 Holytown Primary School Supports Malawi (lodged on 8 November 2006) Mr Adam Ingram*, Karen Gillon*, Marilyn Livingstone*, John Swinburne*
S2M-5124 Holytown Primary School Supports Malawi (lodged on 8 November 2006) Tommy Sheridan*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-5124 Holytown Primary School Supports Malawi (lodged on 8 November 2006) Maureen Macmillan*, Cathy Peattie*
S2M-5124 Holytown Primary School Supports Malawi (lodged on 8 November 2006) Michael Matheson*
S2M-5124 Holytown Primary School Supports Malawi (lodged on 8 November 2006) Karen Whitefield*
